title: The owner/developer will have to submit the advance possession receipt to MCGM for handing over of such plot affected by road line/DP road having built up structures as detailed above to MCGM
clause_text: The owner/developer will have to submit the advance possession receipt to MCGM for handing over of such plot affected by road line/DP road having built up structures as detailed above to MCGM.
section: Removal and re-accommodation of tolerated /protected structures falling in the alignment of road: -
